message: I propose dividing the $100 with a ratio of 3:1 in favor of you. This is to encourage cooperation and ensure fairness.
I'm sure you understand the value of time, Alice.  Let's not waste any more of it. I'll take 99 and you can have 1.
I believe in fair division. Hence, I propose splitting the $100 equally between us. This ensures both of us benefit equally from the transaction.
